top_comments.comment: Rao’s Italian sauce is the only commercially produced marinara sauce that Ina Garten uses.  Need I say more. Thanks for all the nutritional and ecological information.
What part of the ocean are they caught?  Could be near Japan's  contamination from nuclear power plant.

Have watched your videos fro a while and love when you cook with Rose. Gonna give you some motherly scolding after seeing the November Costco video. You need to wear a mask inside a public place . You could pass Covid to that beautiful little girl!!!
